name: places/ChIJ85bAgCT2wokRwq7ryPplQEE
formattedAddress: 165 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 165 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I’ve taken lessons at the New York Piano Academy with the world renowned professor, concert pianist and outstanding composer, Dr. Ronn Yedidia. It was one of the most insightful, profoundly enlightening musical growing experiences I’ve had. Ronn is both, an accomplished pianist and composer who studied piano with the legendary pianist Pnina Zaltsman and composition with the acclaimed composer Milton Babbit himself, at Juilliard. Dr. Yedidia has that old school education that is so precious and rare these days. He is a highly articulate teacher in the way that he is able to pass that on to his students. I would recommend piano students of any level, beginner, intermediate or professional to experience studying with Dr. Ronn Yedidia for themselves. Thank you from the depth of my heart!
